about.title: About Me
about.description: Backend-oriented Software Engineer with experience building data-intensive and full-stack systems. I currently work at Deloitte developing internal tools that process millions of financial records using Python, SQL, and DuckDB.

items.title: Deloitte – Financial Data Processing Platform
items.description: Internal application used to process and validate millions of financial records.

items.title: Puros Mates – Full-Stack E-commerce
items.description: Full-stack e-commerce system with REST API backend and admin panel.
Leading microservices development and database optimization.
End-to-end feature development using React and Node.js.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you’re building a product-driven team and need an engineer who can work across backend, data, and frontend, feel free to reach out.
